about_the_game:
The ominous Lord Tusk is up to his tricks again and threatens planet domination! Lord Tusk and his dark magic is controlling the planet's citizens and is wreaking havoc in every corner!

Professor Ellie, the planet's key advisor acknowledges this threat and seeks for Super Trunko, a space elephant for help!

Take control of Super Trunko in this challenging top down shooter and blast your way until you restore peace!

Immerse yourself in Super Trunko's world, run, blast, jump on platforms and experience the stunning environments!




GAMEPLAY

Find those super weapon add-ons and blast your way through different biomes and enemies to save the planet.

Tackling the levels will cause damage here and there, be sure to find any health to help your progress.

Each level requires you to clear nearby enemies to access further zone points. Don't forget to search for the Tri Key to unlock the Tri Door to clear each level.

Dash away from enemy projectiles, choose the right weapons at the right time, use those ammo wisely. Do you have what it takes?




FEATURES

- Weapon Add-Ons

4 weapon add-ons to discover in the game, each with its unique ability and power to help your journey.

- Crate Destruction

Myriads of crates are scattered everywhere, blast them to discover if there are any hidden health or ammo.

- Unique Environments

Discover 6 beautiful biomes in this adventurous journey, are you ready to explore?

- Visuals

Stunning toon shaded characters and environments!

- Top Down Shooting With Platform Action

Don't just stay on the ground, time your jumps and jump from platform to platform and look out for the obstacles!
detailed_description:
Steam Deck Controls added

Super Trunko Go Steam Deck controls added in the options and tutorial level

name: Super Trunko Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10 x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 /AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game supports keyboard/mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10 x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 /AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game supports keyboard/mouse

short_description: Super Trunko Go is a challenging top down shooter that takes place in a thrilling space world. Navigate our hero Super Trunko, and help him restore peace back to the planet!
